description:
Learn how to bring colour, composition and techniques together to create a watercolour work of art!

  • You will review the basics from module 1 such as watercolour paper, paints and brushes.
    • You will start mixing colours and use some of the theory of the Colour Wheel.
    • This course was especially made for beginner students to encourage them to pick up a brush and have fun by 'doing'.
  • Northern lights make an excellent reference and students should paint their own interpretation of this fascinating light show in the sky!
  • Begin developing your own personal skills for future paintings
  • Teacher available for any questions during and after this course. She would love to see your original paintings.
  • 50 minutes of video supported with written and verbal step-by-step instructions

At the end of this course, you will have a beautiful, final masterpiece "Northern Lights" to be proud of! Happy Painting
title: Northern Lights in Watercolour for Beginners
